ygData.subject: Re: Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!
ygData.msgSnippet: no diamond is a jewelcraft item, it creates items with all saves (sv magic/disease/fire/cold/poison) its also worth a mint!!! Cogg - Rallos Zek ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
no diamond is a jewelcraft item, it creates items with all saves (sv
magic/disease/fire/cold/poison)

its also worth a mint!!!

Cogg - Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: Daniel McLarney <d-m@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 12:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!


> From: "Daniel McLarney" <d-m@...>
>

would
